kyc_status_pending_description: Complete identity verification to unlock all features and higher transaction limits.
kyc_status_submitted_description: Your documents are being reviewed. This usually takes 1-2 hours.
kyc_status_approved_description: Your identity has been successfully verified.
kyc_status_rejected_description: We couldn't verify your identity. Please check the reason below and try again.
kyc_status_additionalInfo_description: We need some additional information to complete your verification.
kyc_info_security_description: Your documents are encrypted and securely stored.
kyc_info_documents_description: National ID, passport, or driver's license accepted.
kyc_selectDocumentType_description: Choose the type of ID document you want to use for verification.
kyc_capture_frontSide_guidance: Position the front of your document within the frame
kyc_capture_backSide_guidance: Position the back of your document within the frame
kyc_capture_nationalIdInstructions: Make sure all text is clearly visible and the document edges are within the frame
kyc_capture_passportInstructions: Capture the data page with your photo and personal information
kyc_capture_driversLicenseInstructions: Ensure all text is readable and avoid glare from lighting
kyc_capture_backInstructions: Flip your document and capture the back side
kyc_error_imageQuality: Image quality is not acceptable. Please try again.
kyc_error_imageBlurry: Image is too blurry. Please hold your device steady and try again.
kyc_error_imageGlare: Too much glare detected. Adjust lighting and try again.
kyc_error_imageTooDark: Image is too dark. Use better lighting and try again.
kyc_selfie_guidance: Position your face in the oval
kyc_selfie_instructions: Remove glasses and make sure your face is clearly visible
kyc_review_description: Review your documents before submitting. Make sure all information is clearly visible.
kyc_submitted_description: Your documents are being reviewed. We'll notify you once the verification is complete.
